plot: A young girl attends school, dreams of being a successful businesswoman, and lives out of the backseat of her mother's car. Her first sale: convincing her boozy mom that it's time for a change.
title: Ruby Slippers
plot_es: A young girl attends school, dreams of being a successful businesswoman, and lives out of the backseat of her mother's car. Her first sale: convincing her boozy mom that it's time for a change.
